verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy is the Lord, (Holy is the Lord)
Holy is the Lord, (Holy is the Lord)
Holy is the Lord, (Holy is the Lord)
Holy is the Lord. (Holy is the Lord)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Righteousness (righteousness)
And mercy, (and mercy)
Judgement (judgement) and grace. (and grace)
Faithfulness (faithfulness)
And sovereignty, (and sovereignty)
Holy is the Lord, (Holy is the Lord)
Holy is the Lord. (Holy is the Lord)
